targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /$web/) AND ("host" =~ /$webNodeId/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean(usage_user) + mean(usage_system) as "Usage"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY= host where host =~ /-was-/ and host =~ /$domainId/
list.label: 업무구분

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY= host where host =~ /-web-/ and host =~ /$domainId-$bizType/
